parameters.name: RowIndex
parameters.description: Row in the BOM table; 0-based index

parameters.name: ItemNumber
parameters.description: Item number for the specified BOM table row

parameters.name: PartNumber
parameters.description: Part number for the specified BOM table row

title: IBomTableAnnotation.IGetModelPathNames
description: Gets the full pathnames of all documents in the specified row of this BOM table annotation. Also gets the item and part numbers associated with the specified row.
signature:
System.String IGetModelPathNames( 
   System.Int32
RowIndex
,
   System.Int32
Count
,
   out System.String
ItemNumber
,
   out System.String
PartNumber
)

parameters.name: RowIndex
parameters.description: Row in the BOM table; 0-based index

parameters.name: ItemNumber
parameters.description: Item number for the specified BOM table row

parameters.name: PartNumber
parameters.description: Part number for the specified BOM table row

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of model pathnames in the specified row VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
IBomTableAnnotation::GetModelPathNamesCount
to get the value of Count.
